Class UserController

java.lang.Object
be.helha.gdprapp.controllers.UserController

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getAllUsers()

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or @userService.isCurrentUser(#id)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserById(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • getUserByEmail

      @GetMapping("/email/{email}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or authentication.name == #email") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserByEmail(@PathVariable String email)

    • createUser

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createUser(@RequestBody User user)

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or @userService.isCurrentUser(#id)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUser(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestBody User userDetails)

    • deactivateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}/deactivate") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deactivateUser(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • activateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}/activate") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> activateUser(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUser(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • getUsersByRole

      @GetMapping("/role/{roleId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getUsersByRole(@PathVariable Integer roleId)

    • getActiveUsers

      @GetMapping("/active") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getActiveUsers()

    • changePassword

      @PutMapping("/{id}/password") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or @userService.isCurrentUser(#id)") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changePassword(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestBody UserController.PasswordChangeRequest request)
